title: Minuteman Missile National Historic Site: Partners
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Partners            Partners        Colonel James Kowalski, Commander, 28th Bomb Wing, Ellsworth Air Force Base and William R. Supernaugh, Superintendent, Badlands National Park conduct the official transfer of ownership for Delta-01 and Delta-09 in 2002 Ellsworth Air Force Base   Â    Park partner organizations work with the National Park Service in a number of ways. Some offer dynamic education programs that teach students about cultural history through place based learning and hands-on activities. Partners also help National Park units preserve or restore historic structures and raise funds to support park initiatives. Recent partners of Minuteman Missile National Historic Site include the South Dakota Air and Space Museum, the U.S. Air Force, the National Grasslands Visitor Center and the Association of Air Force Missileers. In the near future, Minuteman Missile will begin the process of starting a formal Friends Group. Through partnerships, Minuteman Missile and its partners are developing a shared sense of stewardship to protect and conserve the park's nationally significant cultural resources..
